root: ^Say, detective, have you been to the city yet?
^As much as I hate to support a city built by nasty bee killers, Flora and I have had some lovely visits to some of their cafes.

c-0: ^Oh, you didn't know? The city was built using money from the largest pesticide producer in the land! Horrible stuff. Business has only been increasing for them, I guess demand for pesticides has gone up...

^Hey! Maybe you could find some clues around the city? It wouldn't surprise me if someone around there wanted to get rid of the bees once and for all so they could push their awful toxic chemical agenda.
c-1: ^Yeah! Every weekend we try and find new fun things to do.
^Sadly, there's only so much to do around here, so sometimes we have a day out to the city. But nothing beats a picnic by the lake while the sun is shining and the birds are chirping!
